captureAsset.name: captureAsset
captureAsset.label: Capture Asset
captureAsset.description: Bookmark a timeline moment for an uploaded asset using its asset ID and capture an exact still.

fields.name: timecode
fields.label: Time (seconds)
fields.description: Exact timeline position in seconds.

fields.name: notes
fields.label: Notes
fields.placeholder: Optional context for the captured asset.

captureFaces.name: captureFaces
captureFaces.label: Capture Faces
captureFaces.description: Capture frames from a video at face detection timestamps with bounding boxes drawn around detected faces.

fields.name: faceIndex
fields.label: Face Index (optional)
fields.description: Capture a specific face by index (0-based). Leave empty to capture all faces.

fields.name: notes
fields.label: Notes
fields.placeholder: Optional context for the captured frames.

generateMusic.name: generateMusic
generateMusic.label: Generate Music (Lyria)
generateMusic.description: Generate original music using Google's Lyria AI model. Creates music from a text description including genre, mood, instruments, and tempo.

fields.name: projectId
fields.label: Project ID
fields.description: The project to associate this music with.

fields.name: prompt
fields.label: Music Description
fields.placeholder: Upbeat electronic dance music with synth leads, driving bassline, 128 BPM, energetic festival vibe...
fields.description: Describe the music you want: genre, mood, instruments, tempo, style.

fields.name: durationSeconds
fields.label: Duration
fields.description: Length of the generated music.

generateSpeech.name: generateSpeech
generateSpeech.label: Generate Speech (TTS)
generateSpeech.description: Generate natural-sounding speech from text using Google's TTS model. Great for voiceovers, narration, and accessibility.

fields.name: projectId
fields.label: Project ID
fields.description: The project to associate this audio with.

fields.name: text
fields.label: Text to Speak
fields.placeholder: Enter the text you want to convert to speech...
fields.description: The text to convert to speech (up to 5000 characters).

fields.name: voice
fields.label: Voice
fields.description: Choose the voice for the speech.

getAssetMetadata.name: getAssetMetadata
getAssetMetadata.label: Get Asset Metadata
getAssetMetadata.description: Get detailed metadata for an asset including face detection, shot detection, labels, and transcription.

listAssets.name: listAssets
listAssets.label: List Assets
listAssets.description: Return the uploaded assets currently available in the Assets panel.

projectHistory.name: projectHistory
projectHistory.label: Project History
projectHistory.description: Inspect the undo/redo history of the current project or trigger undo and redo operations.

fields.name: action
fields.label: Action
fields.description: Choose whether to view history, undo, or redo.

fields.name: steps
fields.label: Steps
fields.description: How many steps to undo or redo (defaults to 1). Ignored when showing status.

timelineAddLayer.name: timelineAddLayer
timelineAddLayer.label: Add Timeline Layer
timelineAddLayer.description: Create a new timeline layer using the existing project store helpers.

fields.name: type
fields.label: Layer Type
fields.description: Choose the media type this layer will hold.

timelineAddClip.name: timelineAddClip
timelineAddClip.label: Add Timeline Clip
timelineAddClip.description: Insert a new clip on the timeline using the project store's existing helpers.

fields.name: layerId
fields.label: Layer ID
fields.placeholder: Optional layer ID (defaults to matching layer type)

fields.name: src
fields.label: Source URL
fields.description: Required for media clips (video, audio, image).

fields.name: text
fields.label: Text Content
fields.description: Required for text clips.

fields.name: offset
fields.label: Source Offset
fields.description: Trim the beginning of the source by this many seconds.

fields.name: speed
fields.label: Playback Speed
fields.description: Playback speed multiplier (defaults to 1).

fields.name: position
fields.label: Position
fields.description: Scene position as { x, y } in pixels.

fields.name: scale
fields.label: Scale
fields.description: Scale multiplier as { x, y }.

fields.name: width
fields.label: Width
fields.description: Optional intrinsic media width (video/image).

fields.name: height
fields.label: Height
fields.description: Optional intrinsic media height (video/image).

fields.name: objectFit
fields.label: Object Fit
fields.description: Video object-fit behavior.

fields.name: focus
fields.label: Focus Area
fields.description: Optional video focus region.

fields.name: volume
fields.label: Volume
fields.description: Audio volume (0-1).

fields.name: fontSize
fields.label: Font Size
fields.description: Text clip font size in pixels.

fields.name: opacity
fields.label: Opacity
fields.description: Text opacity (0-1).

timelineSplitClip.name: timelineSplitClip
timelineSplitClip.label: Split Timeline Clip
timelineSplitClip.description: Split an existing clip using the project store's split action to preserve history.

timelineUpdateClip.name: timelineUpdateClip
timelineUpdateClip.label: Update Timeline Clip
timelineUpdateClip.description: Adjust clip timing and type-specific settings while reusing the existing project store update action.

timelineDeleteClip.name: timelineDeleteClip
timelineDeleteClip.label: Delete Timeline Clip
timelineDeleteClip.description: Remove one or more clips from the timeline by their IDs.

fields.name: clipIds
fields.label: Clip IDs
fields.description: JSON array of clip IDs to delete

clipIds.description: List of clip IDs to delete from the timeline

getTimelineState.name: getTimelineState
getTimelineState.label: Get Timeline State
getTimelineState.description: Get the current state of the project timeline including all layers and clips with their IDs, positions, and properties.

fields.name: includeClipDetails
fields.label: Include Clip Details
fields.description: Whether to include detailed clip information

includeClipDetails.description: Whether to include detailed clip information

timelineAddTransition.name: timelineAddTransition
timelineAddTransition.label: Add Timeline Transition
timelineAddTransition.description: Add a transition effect between two adjacent video clips on the same layer. Supports fade and slide transitions.

fields.name: type
fields.label: Transition Type
fields.description: The transition effect to apply between clips.

fields.name: duration
fields.label: Duration (seconds)
fields.description: How long the transition lasts (0.1 to 5 seconds).

timelineRemoveTransition.name: timelineRemoveTransition
timelineRemoveTransition.label: Remove Timeline Transition
timelineRemoveTransition.description: Remove an existing transition between two clips.

videoEffectsList.name: videoEffectsList
videoEffectsList.label: List Video Effects
videoEffectsList.description: Show the available video effect providers and their default parameters.

videoEffectsRun.name: videoEffectsRun
videoEffectsRun.label: Start Video Effect
videoEffectsRun.description: Kick off a video effect job (for example Replicate SAM-2) for a given asset, using the configured provider.

fields.name: effectId
fields.label: Effect
fields.description: Choose which video effect to apply.

fields.name: params
fields.label: Effect Parameters
fields.description: Optional JSON payload to override effect defaults. Leave empty to use defaults.

videoEffectsJobStatus.name: videoEffectsJobStatus
videoEffectsJobStatus.label: Check Video Effect Job
videoEffectsJobStatus.description: Retrieve the latest status for a video effect job.

veoGenerate.name: veoGenerate
veoGenerate.label: Generate Veo Video
veoGenerate.description: Generate a video using Google Veo 3. Returns a job ID that can be polled for completion.

fields.name: projectId
fields.label: Project ID
fields.description: The project to associate this video with.

fields.name: prompt
fields.label: Prompt
fields.placeholder: A cinematic shot of a mountain landscape at sunrise...
fields.description: Describe the video you want to generate in detail.

fields.name: durationSeconds
fields.label: Duration
fields.description: Video duration. Only 8s is available for 1080p and 4K.

fields.name: resolution
fields.label: Resolution
fields.description: Higher resolutions cost more credits and require 8s duration.

fields.name: generateAudio
fields.label: Generate Audio
fields.description: Whether to generate audio with the video.

fields.name: negativePrompt
fields.label: Negative Prompt
fields.description: Optional: describe what to avoid in the generated video.

veoJobStatus.name: veoJobStatus
veoJobStatus.label: Check Veo Job Status
veoJobStatus.description: Check the status of a Veo video generation job.

digestAsset.name: digestAsset
digestAsset.label: Digest Asset
digestAsset.description: Analyze an asset (video, image, or audio) using Gemini's multimodal capabilities. Returns a detailed description of the content.

fields.name: assetId
fields.label: Asset ID
fields.description: The ID of the asset to analyze.

fields.name: query
fields.label: Question (optional)
fields.placeholder: What specific aspects would you like to know about?
fields.description: Optional: Ask a specific question about the asset instead of getting a general analysis.

fields.name: depth
fields.label: Analysis Depth
fields.description: How thorough should the analysis be?

listProjectAssets.name: listProjectAssets
listProjectAssets.label: List Project Assets
listProjectAssets.description: List all assets associated with a specific project.

renderVideo.name: renderVideo
renderVideo.label: Render Video
renderVideo.description: Trigger a video render job for the current project.

generateImage.name: generateImage
generateImage.label: Generate Image
generateImage.description: Generate an image using Google's Gemini image model from a text prompt.
